title: Default save path for camera files and the way to change
answer:
1. In Y625, the camera can set the priority storage location. Click ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109976) > Other > Priority storage location. 

 2. If no SD card is inserted, the default storage is the mobile phoneâ€™s internal storage, and the storage path of the camera is File Management: Internal Storage \ DCIM \ Camera 

 3. When an SD card is inserted, the default storage location is the SD card, and the storage path of the camera is File Management: SD card \ DCIM \Camera.
